TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IsolatedStorage extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class IsolatedStorage Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class IsolatedStorage abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 表示所有隔離的儲存區實作必須衍生自的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all isolated storage implementations must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以檔案為基礎的隔離儲存區的相關資訊，請參閱類別。For information about file-based isolated storage, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式無法使用隔離儲存區。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 請改用 `Windows.Storage` 應用程式開發介面內含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空間中的應用程式資料類別來儲存本機資料和檔案。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Windows 開發人員中心的 [應用程式資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationIdentity As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ApplicationIdentity { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得限定隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 範圍的應用程式識別 (Identity)。

span.span: Gets an application identity that scopes isolated storage.
An that represents the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於應用程式定義會包含應用程式相關聯的所有組件，您可以使用這種類型的身分識別可確保只有與應用程式相關聯的組件具有存取隔離儲存區。Since the definition of an application includes all assemblies associated with the application, you can use this type of identity to ensure that only assemblies associated with the application have access to the isolated storage.

exception.span: 程式碼缺少存取這個物件所需的 。

span.span: The code lacks the required to access this object.

exception.span: 這些使用權限是由 Runtime 根據安全性原則授與。

span.span: These permissions are granted by the runtime based on security policy.

exception.span: 物件不是由應用程式 所隔離。

span.span: The object is not isolated by the application .

permission.span: 提供存取的辨識項的能力。

span.span: for the ability to access evidence.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 取得用來限定隔離儲存區範圍的組件識別 (Assembly Identity)。

span.span: Gets an assembly identity used to scope isolated storage.
An that represents the identity.

exception.span: 程式碼缺少存取這個物件所需的 。

span.span: The code lacks the required to access this object.
The assembly is not defined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AvailableFreeSpace As Long
public: virtual property long AvailableFreeSpace { long get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得隔離儲存區的可用空間 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the available free space for isolated storage, in bytes.

value.span: 隔離儲存區的可用空間 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The available free space for isolated storage, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫這個屬性。The property overrides this property.

exception.span: 已執行需要存取 的作業，但尚未針對此存放區定義該屬性。

span.span: An operation was performed that requires access to , but that property is not defined for this store.

exception.span: 因為部分辨識項用來開啟存放區，使用列舉所取得的存放區沒有妥善定義 屬性。

span.span: Stores that are obtained by using enumerations do not have a well-defined property, because partial evidence is used to open the store.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrentSize As ULong
public: virtual property System::UInt64 CurrentSize { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示隔離儲存區的目前大小。

span.span: Gets a value representing the current size of isolated storage.

value.span: 隔離儲存區範圍內目前使用的儲存區位元組數。

span.span: The number of storage units currently used within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示隔離儲存區範圍內的所有存放裝置資源的使用量總計。This property represents the total usage of all storage resources within the isolated storage scope. 實作這個屬性。 implements this property. 如果是物件，這個值是以位元組為單位。In the case of objects, this value is in bytes. 在其他儲存體物件，例如資料庫、 實作的情況下此值可能會在其他單位的儲存體中。In the case of implementations of other storage objects, such as a database, this value might be in other units of storage.

exception.span: 隔離儲存區的目前大小未定義。

span.span: The current size of the isolated store is undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission GetPermission(class System.Security.PermissionSet ps) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetPermission (ps As PermissionSet) As IsolatedStoragePermission

param.name: ps
param.span: 物件，這個物件包含授權給嘗試使用隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 之程式碼的使用權限集合。

span.span: The object that contains the set of permissions granted to code attempting to use isolated storage.

summary.span: 在由衍生類別實作時，會從使用權限集合中傳回表示存取隔離儲存區的使用權限。

span.span: When implemented by a derived class, returns a permission that represents access to isolated storage from within a permission set.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫這個方法在衍生類別以決定哪些權限類型管理它們的使用，並傳回型別已被授與的權限。You call this method on derived classes to determine what permission type governs their use, and to return the permission of the type that has been granted. 您可以使用這項資訊來判斷允許的配額，以及任何其他衍生的類別的特定隔離儲存區設定。Use this information to determine the allowable quota and any other derived class-specific isolated storage settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IncreaseQuotaTo(int64 newQuotaSize) cil managed
Public Overridable Function IncreaseQuotaTo (newQuotaSize As Long) As Boolean
abstract member IncreaseQuotaTo : int64 -> bool override this.IncreaseQuotaTo : int64 -> bool

param.name: newQuotaSize
param.span: 所要求新的配額大小 (以位元組為單位)，以提供使用者核准。

span.span: The requested new quota size, in bytes, for the user to approve.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，提示使用者核准更大的隔離儲存區配額大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, prompts a user to approve a larger quota size, in bytes, for isolated storage.
in all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MaximumSize As ULong
public: virtual property System::UInt64 MaximumSize { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示隔離儲存區的最大可用空間量。

span.span: Gets a value representing the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個值可以使用不同的測量單位。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this value can take different units of measure.

value.span: 隔離儲存區的最大空間量，以位元組表示。

span.span: The maximum amount of isolated storage space in bytes.

value.span: 衍生類別可以傳回不同的值單位。

span.span: Derived classes can return different units of value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作屬性傳回的值，這以位元組表示。The default implementation of the property returns the value of , which is expressed in bytes. 在衍生的類別可以用來表示其他量值單位中的值。Derived classes can express the value in other units of measure. 這類實作的潛在範例是隔離儲存區資料庫。A potential example of such an implementation is an isolated storage database. 您不能設定，但是配額設定的安全性原則，而且可以設定。You cannot set , but the quota is configured in the security policy, and can be set. 程式碼會接收根據它的辨識項的空間配額，因此如果執行不同的辨識項使用相同的程式碼可以接收不同的配額 （例如，在內部網路上執行本機及共用相同的應用程式可以接收不同的配額）。Code receives a quota of space on the basis of its evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence (for example, the same application run locally and from a share on an intranet can receive different quotas). 實作這個屬性。 implements this property.

span.span: The quota has not been defined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Quota As Long
public: virtual property long Quota { long get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示隔離儲存區空間的最大可用空間量。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that represents the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage.

value.span: 隔離儲存區空間的限制，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The limit of isolated storage space, in bytes.

span.span: An operation was performed that requires access to , but that property is not defined for this store.

exception.span: 因為部分辨識項用來開啟存放區，使用列舉所取得的存放區沒有妥善定義 屬性。

span.span: Stores that are obtained by using enumerations do not have a well-defined property, because partial evidence is used to open the store.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, removes the individual isolated store and all contained data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法。 implements this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As IsolatedStorageScope

summary.span: 取得 列舉型別值，指定用來隔離存放區的範圍。

span.span: Gets an enumeration value specifying the scope used to isolate the store.

value.span: 位元組合指定使用隔離儲存區的範圍內的值。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values specifying the scope used to isolate the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因素 （使用者、 組件、 網域及等等） 的組合會隔離存放區。Stores are isolated by a combination of factors (user, assembly, domain, and so on).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property SeparatorExternal As Char
protected: virtual property char SeparatorExternal { char get(); };

summary.span: 取得可以用在目錄字串中的反斜線字元。

span.span: Gets a backslash character that can be used in a directory string.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，可能會傳回另一個字元。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, another character might be returned.

value.span: 預設實作會傳回 '\\' （反斜線） 字元。

span.span: The default implementation returns the '\\' (backslash) character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來取得目錄字串中使用的字元。This property can be used to get a character that is used in a directory string.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您可以覆寫並傳回一個字元以外 '\\' 來控制存放區的命名的語法。在 Windows 中這個分隔符號是 '\\'。
When you inherit from , you can override and return a character other than the '\\' to control the naming syntax of the store. In a Windows this separator is a '\\'.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property SeparatorInternal As Char
protected: virtual property char SeparatorInternal { char get(); };

summary.span: 取得可以用在目錄字串中的句號字元。

span.span: Gets a period character that can be used in a directory string.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，可能會傳回另一個字元。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, another character might be returned.

value.span: 預設實作會傳回 '。 '（句號） 字元。

span.span: The default implementation returns the '.' (period) character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來取得目錄字串中使用的字元。This property can be used to get a character that is used in a directory string.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您可以覆寫並傳回一個字元以外 '。 ' 來控制存放區的命名的語法。在 Windows 中這個分隔符號是 '。 '。
When you inherit from , you can override and return a character other than the '.' to control the naming syntax of the store. In a Windows this separator is a '.'.
